text: Dirty Rotten Scoundrels is a 1988 American comedy movie directed by Frank Oz and is a remake of the 1964 movie Bedtime Story and was remade as The Hustle in 2019. It stars Steve Martin, Michael Caine, Glenne Headly, Anton Rodgers, Ian McDiarmid, Dana Ivey, Frances Conroy and was distributed by Orion Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1988 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Movie remakes Category:Movies directed by Frank Oz Category:Movies set in France Category:Movies adapted into plays
title: Dirty Rotten Scoundrels
